import React from "react"; import "./Card.css"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import Cookies from "universal-cookie"; const Card = () => { const [card, setCard] = useState([]); const cookies = new Cookies(); var userEmail = cookies.get("email"); const getCard = () => { let userDetails = { email: userEmail, }; fetch("http://localhost:4000/getCard", { method: "POST", body: JSON.stringify(userDetails), headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, }) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((json) => { console.log(json); setCard(json); }); }; useEffect(() => { getCard(); }, []); return (
Shopping cart
{card.length !== 0 && (
You have {card.card.length} items in your cart
{card.card.map((item) => (
{item}
 {" "}  $
))}
)}


Continue with Order

); }; export default Card;
